评论详情: I got one in gray and it is soft, nice quality, and fits so nicely! I can wear it to work under a cardigan and go straight to the gym after. I wanted a few more in different colors, so I purchased a purple one. Unfortunately, that one does not have the built-in bra. Be sure you know whether you’re getting the right item before adding to your cart.

The colors are pretty, it's long which is ok but runs a bit large. Washes nicely.  I bought a medium but a small might have fit better.  I use it for exercise class and zumba and it's nice and lightweight.

I love these for working out and spending time in the heat. They are well made and have very pretty colors that don't run in the wash or shrink. I did find that they run a bit large. I ordered the purple and magenta type color.  I like my shirts a bit long and these are that, and they are flowy. They are not too flowy for me, but just a little roomier than I expected. I think I could have gone a size down, but I always like the option of wearing another cute close fitting tank underneath, so I didn't try a smaller size. The shoulder area fits as expected and these are comfy tanks.

I intend to use this as a layering shirt.  I live in East Texas.  There is air conditioning the Spring/Summer time and cool to cold weather in the late Fall and Winter.  So I thought it would be a good look under a jacket or sweater.It is very thin which would be great if you work out and get sweaty.  As a layering top has yet to de determined.
True to size I would buy again great material
These are SO comfy and cute! I’ve used them for lounging tops or housework wear for years. You will love them and want them in multiple colors!
